user.title: EG4 Web Monitor Setup
user.description: Connect to your EG4 Web Monitor account to manage your solar inverters, GridBOSS devices, and battery systems.

data_description.username: Your EG4 Web Monitor account username
data_description.password: Your EG4 Web Monitor account password
data_description.base_url: The base URL for the EG4 Web Monitor API
data_description.verify_ssl: Enable SSL certificate verification for secure connections

plant.title: Select Station
plant.description: Choose which solar station/plant to monitor. You can add additional stations by creating separate integration instances.

data_description.plant_id: Select the solar installation you want to monitor

reauth.title: Reauthenticate EG4 Web Monitor
reauth.description: Your session has expired or credentials are invalid. Please re-enter your credentials to continue monitoring your devices.

reauth_confirm.title: Confirm Reauthentication
reauth_confirm.description: Please confirm your updated credentials to restore access to your EG4 devices.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure EG4 Web Monitor
reconfigure.description: Update your EG4 Web Monitor configuration settings. You can change connection parameters or switch to a different station.

data_description.username: Your EG4 Web Monitor account username
data_description.password: Your EG4 Web Monitor account password
data_description.base_url: The base URL for the EG4 Web Monitor API
data_description.verify_ssl: Enable SSL certificate verification for secure connections

reconfigure_plant.title: Change Station
reconfigure_plant.description: Select a different solar station/plant to monitor with this integration instance.

data_description.plant_id: Select the solar installation you want to monitor

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to EG4 Web Monitor. Please check your network connection and try again.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid username or password. Please check your credentials and try again.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or check the logs for more details.
error.no_plants: No solar stations/plants found in your account. Please ensure you have at least one station configured in your EG4 Web Monitor account.
error.invalid_plant: The selected station/plant is no longer available. Please select a different station.
error.timeout: Connection to EG4 Web Monitor timed out. Please check your internet connection and try again.

abort.already_configured: This EG4 Web Monitor station is already configured. Each station requires a separate integration instance.
abort.reauth_successful: Reauthentication successful! Your EG4 Web Monitor integration is now reconnected.
abort.reconfigure_successful: Reconfiguration successful! Your EG4 Web Monitor settings have been updated.

init.title: EG4 Web Monitor Options
init.description: Configure advanced options for your EG4 Web Monitor integration.

data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the EG4 API for updates (minimum 30 seconds)

refresh_data.name: Refresh Data
refresh_data.description: Force an immediate refresh of device data from the EG4 API, bypassing the normal polling interval.

entry_id.name: Configuration Entry ID
entry_id.description: The configuration entry ID to refresh. If not provided, all EG4 Web Monitor integrations will be refreshed.

entry_not_found.message: Configuration entry {entry_id} not found. Please verify the entry ID is correct.

entry_not_loaded.message: Configuration entry {entry_id} is not loaded. Please ensure the integration is properly configured and running.

no_coordinators.message: No EG4 coordinators found to refresh. Please ensure at least one EG4 Web Monitor integration is configured and loaded.
